ing: 2 (1 gram) packets granular sucralose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®)
2 fluid ounces white rum (such as CruzanÂ®)
des: "Just a regular old frozen daiquiri without the concern of raising your glucose level!"
ins: Mix sweetener with lime juice and white rum in a small bowl until sweetener has dissolved. Place ice cubes into a blender and pour rum mixture over ice; blend until slushy, about 2 minutes. Pour into a glass.
